tags: i wanna read this fic now real bad
summary: (star wars sitcom fic anon) of course it's rose!! crylo ron has been obliterated by rey in this universe, it's post-war and is...
question: (star wars sitcom fic anon) of course it's rose!! crylo ron has been obliterated by rey in this universe, it's post-war and is basically about the gang trying to learn how to heal and feel again, after war, and neutralise the rest of the first order scattered around the universe. don't worry, i literally could not give less of a shit about kylo

body: hey! i’m jenna. this is my writing blog!! ive been a fic/oneshot writer for a while but i’ve never made a page for it so.. here we go!! i write a lot of star wars fic so, stick around if you’re interested. i’ll be posting more stuff here in a bit!

blog.name: praetor-canis
blog.title: Musings Of A Neuro-Nerd
blog.description: Neuroscientist. Imperial. Avid Star Wars Fan. Random thoughts of a Star Wars fan who also happens to love history and Wuxia. Usually post long rants on SW and Science, but due to a unique mixture of fandoms and interests, my rants tend to cover a lot of areas, from Eastern Culture to the Chinese Language to Interesting tidbits and Stories.

summary: Hey, you know that the Sith custom of taking up a new name and forsaking your old one is actually practiced in Buddhism and...
body: Hey, you know that the Sith custom of taking up a new name and forsaking your old one is actually practiced in Buddhism and Taoism, right? It’s one of first steps that a person takes when committing to these two religions as a monk or priest. An important first step in detachment from the material world and reaching enlightenment.

reblog.comment: Hey, you know that the Sith custom of taking up a new name and forsaking your old one is actually practiced in Buddhism and Taoism, right? blog.name: hopelesslyreylo
blog.title: Hopelessly Reylo
blog.description: Too far down the Reylo trash compactor to be salvageable. Also, I make fun of how obsessed I am over Reylo all the time, so no need to tell me what I already know. Also, I write fanfiction (Fanfiction.net and AO3 u/n: SignaltheStars). Reylo since 2015 (but new to the Tumblr Reylo community).

body:
Not-So-Early Morning Thoughts

I slept in this morning, so these thoughts are coming later than usual.

I’m not going to spend a lot of time on this because it’s obviously a busy day, but I want to discuss this:

I have to wonder what is going on. We see Leia and Rey hugging and a tear streaking down Rey’s cheek. So, what’s going on? I have a few theories. Some I like, some I swear to God if they happen….🤬🤬🤬

1. They’re hugging in grief because Ben dies. I don’t like this one. I would think that if that was the case, Leia would be more emotional. The main thing I want is for Ben and Rey to survive the sequels. They need to bring balance together. Sure, after Vader and the Emperor died, Luke does say there was balance for a while, but then that changed. I think that balance has to be achieved by two, not one.

2. They hugging before Rey goes off to bring Ben back. I’m okay with this one. Maybe Rey is emotional because of something Leia says. Don’t have much more on it. Could be the case.

3. This is a vision. Leia dies and visits Rey in a vision to tell her something. This could be an emotional sendoff to Leia and Carrie Fisher. We don’t know what they decided with Carrie’s character. Would they think it appropriate to kill off Leia? The scene looks very dream-like. It could be the effects they had to use to put Carrie in the scene or just the setting itself creating that effect. Maybe Rey feels she cannot continue after losing Leia and Leia comes to her to tell her that she knows she can save the galaxy and Ben. It would be a beautiful sendoff. But, I don’t know if Carrie’s family was okay with Leia dying. I have a feeling this may be the case and will probably be the reason I need to see the movie several times because I’ll be crying through the end of the movie, on the way home from the theater, and probably for the next five days if this happens.

4. Rey and Ben just got married and Rey is crying because she has her family. I don’t think that that’s what’s happening. I’m just throwing it out there. Rey looks sad. That tear doesn’t look like a tear of happiness.


Anyways, that’s all I got. Happy Easter to those who celebrate.

blog.name: laufire
blog.title: a spell is no more than a recipe for change

tags: jic for that last paragraph lol
summary: thanks maybe to the fact that I still haven’t watched past TFA (which I was meh about tbh), I have exactly three feelings* about...
body:
thanks maybe to the fact that I still haven’t watched past TFA (which I was meh about tbh), I have exactly three feelings* about the new SW trilogy: “I love John Boyega”, “Leia/Poe is the perfect May-December ship my dash has been too coward to talk about”, and “Disney should give Hayden Christensen cameos specifically to cater to ME”.

so basically, whenever Drama™ crosses my dash I’m only sure of 60-70% of what’s going on, I feel low-key amused, and I kinda look forward to the next movie completely upending everyone and everything lmao

*I actually have a fourth feeling, which is basically “I don’t know Rose, but she seems cool, and if your enthusiasm for your made up trio finally getting scenes together specifically relies on ignoring her existence instead of acknowledging TFA never really bothered establishing that dynamic, I don’t like u.”

blog.name: clonewarsreturns
blog.title: Lets Talk Clone Wars!
blog.description: Clone wars was such a huge part of my life because it gave me an escape when I needed it most. Let’s have fun and celebrate together!!! Share your ocs and headcanons and we can scream together!!

summary: I saw the cute clone art. Does this mean you take clone oc drawing requests? :)
question: I saw the cute clone art. Does this mean you take clone oc drawing requests? :)
answer: Yep!! I also do Jedi and really any Star Wars universe ocs 😄 it’s just fun for me! Everyone on here has been so supportive of my ocs in the past and I want to do the same for others! It’d help a lot if you have a reference pic of your oc but if not then expect a few happy messages from me asking detailed questions about them🤣but yeah! I don’t do nsfw and it may take me a bit if my work schedule gets In the way but I’ll get it done!

title: The Teacher Needs a Teacher
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2KTqDYg

by Linneleth22

Ben Solo is a 34 year-old teacher with 10 years of teaching beneath his belt. Enter Rey Niima, 22 years old and newly certified, ready to teach and set the world on fire. Was it any wonder that she blazed her way into his mind and heart?

summary: Introducing: THE MALCONTENT OF MARS, an anti-space opera novel - COMING THIS SUMMER
title: Introducing: THE MALCONTENT OF MARS, an anti-space opera novel - COMING THIS SUMMER
body:
Introducing: THE MALCONTENT OF MARS, an anti-space opera novel – COMING THIS SUMMER

The Malcontent of Mars

being a chronicle of events some centuries from the present day and time

an anti-space opera

taking place within the bounds of our own solar system

by
C R E Mullins

Some centuries from now, humanity has successfully colonised Mars, Venus and the asteroid belt. However, all is not well in the Solar System. Ten years have passed since a catastrophic war between Terra and…
